TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RoleProviderCollection extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection
Public NotInheritable Class RoleProviderCollection Inherits ProviderCollection

summary.span: 繼承 抽象類別的物件之集合。

span.span: A collection of objects that inherit the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式的角色提供者會公開為唯讀由屬性類別。The role providers for an application are exposed as a read-only by the property of the class. 您可以依名稱存取特定角色中的提供者集合，並將其轉型為特定的提供者型別，例如。You can access a specific role provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 這可讓您從單一應用程式中的多個資料存放區中管理角色資訊，以及存取自訂角色提供者的成員不屬於抽象類別。This enables you to manage role information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a role provider that are not part of the abstract class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列出啟用應用程式和其各自的型別提供者。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.Roles#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Roles/CS/Providerscs.aspx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.Roles#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Roles/VB/Providersvb.aspx#7)]

span.span: Copies the role provider collection to a one-dimensional array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用角色提供者物件複製到指定的陣列。This method uses to copy role provider objects to the specified array. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，將複製的內容陣列物件。The following code example uses the method to copy the contents of a to an array of objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式的角色提供者會公開為唯讀由屬性類別。The role providers for an application are exposed as a read-only by the property of the class. 您可以依名稱存取特定角色中的提供者集合，並將其轉型為特定的提供者型別，例如。You can access a specific role provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 這可讓您從單一應用程式中的多個資料存放區中管理角色資訊，以及存取自訂角色提供者的成員不屬於抽象類別。This enables you to manage role information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a role provider that are not part of the abstract class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例存取設定從應用程式的屬性類別名稱。The following code example accesses a configured for an application from the property of the class by name.
